summary: While on a vacation in Central America, some American teenagers are kidnapped by terrorists. A rescue mission is sent after them, but they manage to escape and join up with a mercenary fighting the terrorists.
cast: Jason Miller|Cleavon Little|Rodolfo de Anda|Terri Garber|Douglas Warhit|Willard E. Pugh|Jim Greenleaf|Mary Beth Evans|Tim Robbins|Jay Baker|Larry Poindexter|Alejandro Arroyo|Tracy Scoggins|James Andronica|Martin LaSalle|Roger Cudney|Pamela Gual|Angélica Aragón|Earl Sorenson|José Gómez Parcero|Abel Woolrich|George Belanger|Sebastian Ligarde|José Antonio Estrada|Linda Passmore|Carolina Valero|Ron Ross
keywords: central america|rescue operation|teenager|death of priest|death squad
title: Jóvenes comandos
